# GRAPHICS::SET_CHECKPOINT_CLIPPLANE_WITH_POS_NORM

## Summary
Sets the clip plane of a checkpoint using position and normal (pass a zero normal to clear the clip plane)

## Parameters
* **CHECKPOINT_INDEX** uniqueCheckpoint
* **FLOAT** scrVecPositionX
* **FLOAT** scrVecPositionY
* **FLOAT** scrVecPositionZ
* **FLOAT** scrVecNormalX
* **FLOAT** scrVecNormalY
* **FLOAT** scrVecNormalZ

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This does not move an existing checkpoint... so wtf.
